title: Nanoparticle-delivered miR-486-5p inhibits H
abstract: Acute kidney injury (AKI) is a serious condition characterized by a sudden decrease in kidney function, often leading to chronic kidney disease. Current treatment options are limited, necessitating novel therapeutic strategies. We previously showed that microRNA-486-5p (miR-486-5p) protects against AKI by regulating cell death (apoptosis) both
